'''Blazing Extremes''' is a subevent during [[Traces of Artistry]] event.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Traces of Artistry Blazing Extremes 1.png
|text1  = In Blazing Extremes challenges, you must head to multiple arenas one by one and defeat all opponents there.
|image2 = Tutorial Traces of Artistry Blazing Extremes 2.png
|text2  = Each time you defeat all foes in a given wave, wind currents will be produced to better help you collect your loot.
}}

==Challenges==
{{Description|In the intense heat of battle, warriors extend and contract their bodies to the very limit in order to unleash maximal power. The explosive tension of such "dynamics" is also a key element that can be observed and analyzed in certain works of graffiti.<br>Thus, if one personally joins in the fray, they will almost certainly be able to capture superlative critical "dynamic" moments themselves...|Map Marker Description}}
